00039 #ifndef TPHOTONMAPFACTORY_H_
00040 #define TPHOTONMAPFACTORY_H_
00041 
00042 #include <QtPlugin>
00043 
00044 class QString;
00045 class QIcon;
00046 class TPhotonMap;
00047 
00048 class TPhotonMapFactory
00049 {
00050 public:
00051         virtual ~TPhotonMapFactory() {}
00052     virtual QString TPhotonMapName() const  = 0;
00053     virtual QIcon TPhotonMapIcon() const = 0;
00054     virtual TPhotonMap* CreateTPhotonMap( ) const = 0;
00055 };
00056 
00057 Q_DECLARE_INTERFACE( TPhotonMapFactory, "tonatiuh.TPhotonMapFactory")
